generated.css: body{width:95%;text-align:center;margin:0 auto}.container{width:85%;margin:0 auto;display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:space-evenly}.container h3{pointer-events:none}.container__column{text-align:center;border:2px solid #000;width:100%;display:flex;flex-direction:column}.kanban-item{text-align:center;width:80%;border:1px solid #000;margin:0 auto 1em;display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:center}.kanban-item p{pointer-events:none}.kanban-item button{display:none;float:right}.kanban-item-selected{background-color:red}.kanban-item-selected button{display:inline}@media only screen and (max-width:600px){.container{width:90%;flex-direction:column}}
